TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit JavaScriptConverter extends System.Object

summary.span: 为自定义类型转换器提供抽象基类。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for a custom type converter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类，可实现序列化和反序列化进程不本机支持的托管类型类。The class enables you to implement serialization and deserialization processes for managed types that are not natively supported by the class. 此外可以使用时需要更好地控制的序列化和反序列化过程。You can also use when you need more control over the serialization and deserialization process. 属性指示为其自定义转换器提供转换器服务的类型。The property indicates the types for which a custom converter provides converter services. 若要指示必须通过使用自定义转换器实例，必须与实例中注册该转换器。To indicate that a custom converter must be used by the instance, you must register the converter with the instance. 如果使用的直接类中，应使用方法来注册该转换器。If you are using the class directly, you should use the method to register the converter. 否则，如果您要调用 Web 方法从 ECMAScript (JavaScript)，并且你想要使用自定义转换器，则可以通过注册添加`converters`配置文件中的元素。Otherwise, if you are invoking Web methods from ECMAScript (JavaScript) and you want to use the custom converter, you can register it by adding a `converters` element in the configuration file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 配置 Microsoft Ajax 中的 ASP.NET 服务](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30)。For more information, see [How to: Configure ASP.NET Services in Microsoft Ajax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30). 当实例序列化具有注册，自定义转换器的类型的序列化程序调用方法。When the instance is serializing a type for which it has a custom converter registered, the serializer calls the method. 同样，当实例反序列化 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 字符串，并识别 JSON 字符串中的类型具有与其关联的序列化程序调用的自定义转换器方法。Similarly, when the instance is deserializing a JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) string and recognizes that a type inside the JSON string has a custom converter associated with it, the serializer calls the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个自定义转换器，用于类。The following example shows how to create a custom converter for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.vb#2)]

block.para:
继承自，必须重写以下成员：
When you inherit from , you must override the following members:
-
- - 提供了方法的实施者，将使用。 - provides the method that will be used by implementers of .转换器代码必须能够获取序列化程序将传递给它，字典中包含的值，然后将该值转换为类型的对象。Converter code must be able to take a value that is contained in the dictionary that the serializer passes to it, and then convert that value into an object of type .而不是重新实现自定义转换代码来实现此目的，可以调用方法。Rather than re-implementing the custom conversion code to accomplish this, you can call the method.

related.span: ASP.NET AJAX 中的 web 服务

span.span: Web Services in ASP.NET AJAX

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object Deserialize (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,object> dictionary, Type type, System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer serializer);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Deserialize(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, object> dictionary, class System.Type type, class System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer serializer) cil managed

public: abstract System::Object ^ Deserialize(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ dictionary, Type ^ type, System::Web::Script::Serialization::JavaScriptSerializer ^ serializer);
abstract member Deserialize : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, obj> * Type * System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer -> obj

param.name: dictionary
param.span: 作为名称/值对存储的属性数据的 实例。

span.span: An instance of property data stored as name/value pairs.
The type of the resulting object.
The instance.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，将所提供的字典转换为指定类型的对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, converts the provided dictionary into an object of the specified type.
The deserialized object.

para.span: 方法循环访问中的值参数来构造中请求的类型的实例参数。

span.span: The method iterates through the values in the parameter to construct an instance of the type requested in the parameter.

para.span: 尽管一个转换器可以直接使用来自值，我们建议使用转换器实施者方法相反。

span.span: Although a converter can directly use values from , we recommend that the converter implementer use the method instead.

para.span: 转换器应调用此方法的实例可从参数。

span.span: The converter should call this method of the instance available from the parameter.

para.span: 方法，转换器将从属性值传递，然后返回所需类型的值。

span.span: The method enables converter to pass a property value from , and then return a value of the expected type.

para.span: 在某些情况下，自定义类型的转换器可能正在处理自身注册有转换器的属性 （例如，键入一个具有类型 B 的属性和类型 B 也是与自定义转换器相关联）。

span.span: In some cases, a converter for a custom type might be working with properties that themselves have registered converters (for example, type A has a property of type B, and type B is also associated with a custom converter).

para.span: 在这种情况下，调用可确保自定义转换器会以递归方式调用的字典中包含的属性数据。

span.span: In that case, invoking makes sure that custom converters will be recursively invoked for property data that is contained in the dictionary.

para.span: 当转换器循环访问字典中的所有项时，它返回目标类型的构造的实例。

span.span: When the converter has iterated through all entries in the dictionary, it returns a constructed instance of the target type.

para.span: 如果转换器反序列化期间遇到问题，则它应引发描述问题的错误。

span.span: If the converter encounters a problem during deserialization, it should throw an error that describes the problem.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, object> Serialize(object obj, class System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer serializer) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Serialize (obj As Object, serializer As JavaScriptSerializer) As IDictionary(Of String, Object)

public: abstract System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ Serialize(System::Object ^ obj, System::Web::Script::Serialization::JavaScriptSerializer ^ serializer);

span.span: The object to serialize.
The object that is responsible for the serialization.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，生成名称/值对的字典。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, builds a dictionary of name/value pairs.

returns.span: 一个对象，包含表示该对象数据的键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent the object’s data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当为其注册自定义转换器，将类型序列化为实例调用方法。When you serialize a type for which a custom converter is registered, the instance invokes the method.

para.span: 返回值必须是具有零个或多个名称/值对表示要转换为 JSON 对象的数据的实例。

span.span: The return value of must be an instance with zero or more name/value pairs that represent an object’s data to be converted to JSON.

para.span: 该转换器本身不数据序列化为 JSON。

span.span: The converter itself does not serialize data as JSON.

para.span: 相反，转换器会生成包含属性名称 （字符串字典的键） 和相应的属性的名称/值对的字典值 （对象在字典中的值）。

span.span: Instead, the converter builds a dictionary of name/value pairs that contain the property names (the string key for the dictionary) and corresponding property values (the object value in the dictionary).

para.span: 实例随后将这些数据转换为 JSON。

span.span: The instance subsequently converts these to JSON.

para.span: 如果转换器遇到异常，则它应引发描述问题的错误。

span.span: If the converter encounters an exception, it should throw an error that describes the problem.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SupportedTypes As IEnumerable(Of Type)

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取受支持类型的集合。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of the supported types.

value.span: 一个实现 的对象，用于表示转换器支持的类型。

span.span: An object that implements that represents the types supported by the converter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性列出了支持的转换器的类型。The property lists the types that are supported by the converter. 在运行时，实例使用此属性来确定托管类型映射到其相应的自定义转换器。At run time, a instance uses this property to determine the mapping of managed types to their corresponding custom converters. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写派生类中的属性。The following example shows how to override the property in a derived class. 在此示例中，此转换器仅支持类型。In this example, the converter supports only the type. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.vb#3)]

para.span: 必须始终返回一个集合，并且集合必须包含至少一个条目。

span.span: must always return a collection, and the collection must contain at least one entry.
